summary: Changes the werewolf man-run, for a more beastial form on all-fours.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center]Werewolf Beast Run[/center][/size]

[size=2]This changes the werewolf running animation from a two-legged, humanoid run, to a more beastial run on all-fours, like the werewolf sprint animation. 

This was for personal use, but I figuired others may like it also, enjoy.

[b]To Install:[/b]

Simply put the files into: (folder path is supplied with files) Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\actors\\werewolfbeast\\animations

[b]To Uninstall:[/b]

Remove the werewolfbeast folder from Meshes\\actors\\
[/size]
author: Kieranh7
